TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AccessControlList extends System.Collections.CollectionBase

summary.span: 包含存取控制項目的清單，指定一或多個信任者的存取權限。

span.span: Contains a list of access control entries, specifying access rights for one or more trustees.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別來指定多個信任者，並設定權限時，透過單一呼叫加入與存取權限。Use the class to specify multiple trustees and access rights to add with a single call when setting permissions. 加入存取控制項目針對每個信任者和存取權限組合來建構您的存取控制清單。Construct your access control list by adding an access control entry for each trustee and access rights combination. A識別，允許或拒絕安全性實體物件的存取權的信任。A identifies the trustees that are allowed or denied access to a securable object. 當處理序嘗試存取的安全性實體物件時，系統會檢查物件的存取控制清單來判斷是否要授與存取權限的存取控制項目。When a process tries to access a securable object, the system checks the access control entries in the object's access control list to determine whether to grant access to it. 如果物件沒有的存取控制清單，系統會授與的完整存取權的所有項目。If the object does not have an access control list, the system grants full access to everything. 如果物件的存取控制清單沒有任何項目，系統會拒絕所有嘗試存取的物件。If the object's access control list has no entries, the system denies all attempts to access the object. 系統會檢查存取控制項目序列中，直到找到一或多個允許的所有要求的存取權限或任何要求的存取權限被拒絕。The system checks the access control entries in sequence until it finds one or more that allow all the requested access rights or until any of the requested access rights are denied. 系統會檢查每個順序，直到發生下列事件之一為止：The system examines each in sequence until one of the following events occurs: - 拒絕存取時明確拒絕任何要求的存取權限，其中一個執行緒的存取權杖中所列的信任。An access-denied explicitly denies any of the requested access rights to one of the trustees listed in the thread's access token. - 一或多個允許存取的明確列出的執行緒存取權杖中的信任者授與所有要求的存取權限的項目。One or more access-allowed items for trustees listed in the thread's access token explicitly grant all the requested access rights. - 所有已檢查的項目，而且沒有仍在至少一個要求的存取權限未明確允許，在此情況下，會隱含拒絕存取。All items have been checked and there is still at least one requested access right that has not been explicitly allowed, in which case, access is implicitly denied.

span.span: Copies the entire access control list to a compatible one-dimensional array of access control entries, starting at the specified index of the target array.
The parameter is .
The parameter is less than zero.

exception.span: 參數大於或等於 參數的長度。

span.span: The parameter is greater than or equal to the length of the parameter.

exception.span: 來源存取控制清單的項目數量大於從 到存取控制項目目的陣列末端的可用空間。

span.span: The number of elements in the source access control list is greater than the available space from to the end of the destination array of access control entries.

public: void Insert(int index, System::Messaging::AccessControlEntry ^ entry);

param.name: index
param.span: 應該插入存取控制項目處之以零啟始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which the access control entry should be inserted.

param.name: entry
param.span: 要插入存取控制清單的 。

span.span: A to insert into the access control list.

summary.span: 將存取控制項目插入存取控制清單中指定的位置處。

span.span: Inserts an access control entry into the access control list at the specified position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`index`參數等於存取控制清單中的項目數目，則項目附加至結尾。If the `index` parameter equals the number of items in the access control list, then the entry is appended to the end. 否則，插入點後的項目向下移動以容納新項目在清單中。Otherwise, the entries after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new item in the list.

exception.span: 參數不是這個存取控制清單中的有效索引。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid index in this access control list.
The parameter is .

public: void Remove(System::Messaging::AccessControlEntry ^ entry);

param.name: entry
param.span: 要從存取控制清單中移除的 。

span.span: The to remove from the access control list.

summary.span: 從存取控制清單中移除第一個特定的存取控制項目。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific access control entry from the access control list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 存取控制項目，請遵循移除的項目會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。The access control entries that follow the removed item move up to occupy the vacated spot.

span.span: The parameter is .
